name: cinetopia - blog-/cover-view with titles
description:
Adds the titles to the new blog-/cover-view

(for: http://cinetopia.ws/)

Additional date-entry (like in tableview) can be added with userscript: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/89334

Further a bug occuring when the preview-pic can't be found (404) is fixed with the upper userscript.
